author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM FABIO FORMS WELL SOUTHWEST OF THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...EXPECTED TO BE SHORT-LIVED...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM FABIO FORMS WELL SOUTHWEST OF THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...EXPECTED TO BE SHORT-LIVED...
 As of 8:00 AM MST Mon Aug 5
 the center of Fabio was located near 14.8, -106.9
 with movement NW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
